div.p: Chef Corp.'s own experience platform for the connoisseur lifestyle, kitchen goods and recipes.
Perfect Chef for the Inspired Chefs at Home

As a premium sub-brand of Chef Corp., Perfect Chef is an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms. Consumers can explore our content in our printed magazine & catalog, as well as in our stores and online.
How the CoreMedia 8 Digital Experience Platform enables our site

The engaging online experiences that characterize Perfect Chef’s online presence are enabled by CoreMedia 8, a next-generation digital experience platform that empowers online retailers to incrementally transform their online stores. Based on deep, real-time IBM WebSphere Commerce integration, it allows us to create and manage visually engaging experiences and immersive content.
CoreMedia 8 provides the Perfect Chef team with the following state-of-the-art capabilities:

ul.li: Ability to Blend Marketing Content and Real-Time Product Information for Product-Aligned Storytelling

div.p: Content created and managed in CoreMedia 8 can be combined with real-time product information to create shopping experiences based on real-life user stories. Stories can be constructed around virtually any product or collection of products in IBM WebSphere Commerce.

ul.li: Digital Experience Hub for Unified Customer Experiences across All Touchpoints and Languages

div.p: CoreMedia 8 provides a unique integration of the CoreMedia content management system and the IBM WebSphere Commerce platform that allows us to create unified brand and e-Commerce experiences that bridge the gap between our online store and our omni-channel marketing sites. CoreMedia 8 is also capable of delivering these bended experiences to all of our regional sites — in multiple languages.

ul.li: Stunning Design Elements and Exciting Layouts

div.p: CoreMedia 8 provides us with a variety of free form layout options and a comprehensive catalog of visually appealing design elements — including slide shows, carousel views, tabs, and more. And, because CoreMedia 8 separates content from layout and presentation, business we can quickly restructure and re-use content in a variety of styles and layouts to maximize impact and effectiveness

Since visual presentation is the top factor affecting a consumer’s purchase decision, companies must make their Web stores aesthetically appealing and visually engaging. CoreMedia 8 makes it easy to manage, edit, and integrate a wide variety of rich media content types including images, PDFs, binary files, style sheets, and sophisticated page layouts.

To help us address the growing importance of smart, internet-enabled mobile devices, CoreMedia 8 provides built-in responsive and adaptive Web capabilities as a foundation for building modern, effective user experiences.

The creation of the stories on the Perfect Chef site is the result of close coordination between our marketing and e-Commerce teams. In order to ensure that these two groups can work together efficiently while still retaining their unique strengths and processes. CoreMedia 8 provides both lightweight and more structured collaboration tools that cover the entire content lifecycle from the creation, to approval, delivery and analysis.
